name: Pong + RPGelements + Magic
description:
In this version of Pong, you can damage the opponent by scoring!

This game lets you use fire and ice magic by spending stamina. Fire triples your damage! Ice slows down the opponent's paddle!

Upgrade your stats (damage, critical attacks and health) by collecting Experience tokens that are spawned randomly on the play field. Spend your upgrade points wisely to gain advantage over your opponent!

The 2 arrows at the middle of the play field accelerate and decelerate the ball depending on the ball's direction!

Obtaining heart tokens that are randomly spawned heals you and thaws Ice attacks.
